Generation VIII.Sword: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun's descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.
Generation VIII.Shield: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The elemental composition of the rocks that form its body were found to match the bedrock of a land far away from this Pokémon’s habitat.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon spends its life gazing at the setting sun. It strides leisurely across grassy plains on legs of rock that weigh over 400 pounds each.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 10 , Lake of Outrage Giant's Seat , Rolling Fields , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Use Dynamax Crystal ★And390 at Watchtower Lair ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Sword Expansion Pass: Giant's Bed , Giant's Foot Slippery Slope , Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
Generation IX.Violet: Union Circle Tera Raid Battle Search ( 4★ )
